perturbation.original_text:
B. Cash Payment:

    (1) HDS will provide payment of Fifty Thousand and NO/100 Dollars ($50,000) made payable to Celebrity's  agent. CSE, as follows

    $10,000 Within ten (10) days of the parties execution of this Agreement
    $15,000 Within 60 days of the parties execution of this agreement
    $25,000* Ten (10) days prior to the Production Session
perturbation.changed_text:
B. Cash Payment:

    (1) HDS will provide payment of Fifty Thousand and NO/100 Dollars ($50,000) made payable to Celebrity's  agent. CSE, as follows

    $10,000 Within fifteen (15) days of the parties execution of this Agreement
    $15,000 Within 45 days of the parties execution of this agreement
    $25,000* Five (5) days prior to the Production Session
perturbation.explanation: This change introduces conflicting payment deadlines. The original text specifies payment dates of 10 days, 60 days, and 10 days prior to the production session, while the modified text specifies 15 days, 45 days, and 5 days prior to the production session, respectively. This creates uncertainty about the exact payment deadlines, creating potential disputes.

perturbation.original_text: A. HDS shall have the right to terminate this Agreement upon ten (10) days prior written notice to Celebrity in  the event Celebrity fails to perform the duties set forth in Paragraph 4 hereof or breaches any other  covenant or agreement set forth herein and fails to cure same (if curable) within seven (7) days of receipt of  written notice. Such termination shall relieve HDS of its obligation to provide any further consideration  pursuant to this Agreement.
perturbation.changed_text: A. HDS shall have the right to terminate this Agreement upon five (5) days prior written notice to Celebrity in  the event Celebrity fails to perform the duties set forth in Paragraph 4 hereof or breaches any other  covenant or agreement set forth herein and fails to cure same (if curable) within fifteen (15) days of receipt of  written notice. Such termination may relieve HDS of its obligation to provide any further consideration  pursuant to this Agreement.
perturbation.explanation: The change introduces conflicting terms regarding termination. The original text specifies a ten (10) day notice period and a seven (7) day cure period, whereas the modified text specifies a five (5) day notice period and a fifteen (15) day cure period. Furthermore, the original text clearly states termination 'shall relieve' HDS of further payment obligations, the modified text uses 'may relieve' introducing ambiguity. This creates uncertainty around the correct termination procedure and obligations.

perturbation.original_text: All policies listed under A, B and C should have a thirty (30) day notice of  cancellation provision or endorsement. HDS will provide Celebrity's agent, CSE, with a certificate of insurance  within five (5) days of its request for same.
perturbation.changed_text: All policies listed under A, B and C should have a fifteen (15) day notice of  cancellation provision or endorsement. HDS will provide Celebrity's agent, CSE, with a certificate of insurance  within ten (10) days of its request for same.
perturbation.explanation: The original text requires a thirty (30) day notice of cancellation and a certificate of insurance within five (5) days, the modified text requires a fifteen (15) day notice of cancellation and a certificate of insurance within ten (10) days. This creates an inconsistency regarding the required notice periods and the deadline for providing the certificate of insurance.
